title: Ticket #4853: Fix condor_status -absent
description:
The code changes to add condor_status -offline was missing an else, causing condor_status -absent to contain many extra lines of output with different formatting options. 

Name                               OpSys      Arch       Went Absent Will Forget

Name                               OpSys      Arch       Went Absent Will Forget Name               OpSys      Arch   State     Activity LoadAv Mem   ActvtyTime
